name: opelrn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: sylbir(wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, crn(c2)), wbr(c0, c2, c1))
stmt.pretty: sylbir(< c0, c1 > ∈ c2, c1 ∈ ran(c2), c0[c2]c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, crn(c2)))
-| wb(wbr(c0, c2, c1), wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(wbr(c0, c2, c1), wcel(c1, crn(c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, crn(c2)))
-| wb(wbr(c0, c2, c1), wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(wbr(c0, c2, c1), wcel(c1, crn(c2)))

body.origin: |- wb(wbr(c0, c2, c1), wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, crn(c2)))
-| wi(wbr(c0, c2, c1), wcel(c1, crn(c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, c2, c1), wcel(c1, crn(c2)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cop(c0, c1), c2), wcel(c1, crn(c2)))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: Membership of second member of an ordered pair in a range. (Contributed by NM, 23-Feb-1997.)
